text: The Uzbekistan national U-17 football team represents Uzbekistan in international U-17 football competitions. It is controlled by the Uzbekistan Football Association and is a member of the Asian Football Confederation. ==Competitions== ===AFC U-16 Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:
